resources.string: In order for this app to work, you need to choose one or more emergency contacts. When you activate the panic button, the app will text these contacts with a help message and your current location. You can review these instructions at any time by clicking the info icon in the toolbar above.
You need to give us access to your phone book, so you can choose emergency contacts.
You need to allow us to send SMS messages on your behalf, so we can automatically alert your emergency contacts when you need help.
You need to give us access to your location, so we can tell your emergency contacts where you are when you need help.
You need to enable location services, so we can figure out where you are when you need help. Would you like to turn them on now?
In order for this app to work, you must choose at least one emergency contact.
I am in danger! Please send help!
You have now set up Panic Button. To further customize your Panic Button settings, click the buttons in the toolbar above.
This is what is texted to your emergency contacts alongside your location when you activate Panic Button.
Hit the big red button to start broadcasting for help.
